page.title: 16My visit to Wetton
page.content:
{Entertainment} There is only one public house in Wetton. It is called 'Ye Olde Royal Oak'. In the pub they play Dominoes and Darts. You could always walk around Wetton for enjoyment, for there are many walks.
{Landscape} The landscape at Wetton is very hilly and the woodland is very spread out.
{Facilities} In Wetton there is a Post Office and a shop. There are benches at the side of the road for people to sit on. There are also litter bins to put rubbish in. There is not a public telephone. Wetton is a nice village and I would like to live there.
